Yggdrasil: Talos was a tall strong bot. I don't what his beast mode 
was of late, but I don't think it changed him much.

He follows Devilcat, not from too far, nor too near.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "We have yet to encounter the Maximals on this planet directly." 
> Devilcat points out.  Gatara taps him on the shoulder and whispers 
> something to him.  The Rogue commander arches an eyebrow.  "But some 
> of us have seen them in battle, as Gatara tells me.  Perhaps if you 
> could describe this Talos fellow, we could help ..."
> 
> He trails off as the Rogue Star's computer alerts him by radio of a 
> comm signal received in his absence.  "Riekan, bring Jayde to the 
> CR.  Yggdrasil, under the circumstances, I suggest you come with us 
- 
> we're dangerously close to Predacon territory."
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Nic" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Yggdrasil: I am Yggdrasil Prime of the Maximal Iron Squad. I am 
> > looking for the Maximal known as Talos. Things are getting itchy 
> back 
> > on Cybertron and the High Command wants him back. All I demand is 
> safe 
> > passage away from here.
> > 
> > He knew he was asking for much, but it was his safest move, lest 
he 
> > wanted to leave in pieces. Besides, he gave them plenty of room to 
> > negotiate, which was not very pleasant, but what choice did he 
> have? 
> > He intruded on their territory and started the fight.
